item.title: To make Ironheart feel tactile, the show’s creative team had to get on the same page
item.description: In Disney Plus’ Ironheart series, a young genius with an uncanny knack for building armored suits finds herself plunged into a shady, criminal underworld that gives her a chance to really show off her

item.title: The 54 Best Shows on Disney+ Right Now (July 2025)
item.description: Ironheart, Doctor Who, and Star Wars: Tales of the Underworld are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: Emmys: HBO and Max Score Most Nominations, Apple Takes a Big Bite
item.description: With a lot of help from ’The Penguin’ and ‘The White Lotus,’ HBO and its sibling streamer earned a record high number of nods for the two platforms.
